data.title: Advertisement Added to Iconic Yankees Pinstriped Jerseys
data.meta_description: I honestly never thought I’d see the day. The New York Yankees have announced they will add an advertisement to the sleeve of their iconic pinstriped jerseys (and the not-so-iconic road greys) starting with their home game against the Kansas City Royals on July 21, 2023. The Yankees jersey advertisement
data.text:
I honestly never thought I’d see the day.

The New York Yankees have announced they will add an advertisement to the sleeve of their iconic pinstriped jerseys (and the not-so-iconic road greys) starting with their home game against the Kansas City Royals on July 21, 2023.

The Yankees jersey advertisement is for Starr Insurance; it shows a royal blue rectangle with “STARR” in white serifed lettering within it above a horizontal white line and “INSURANCE” below.

Twitter user @bkabak sums up the whole situation quite perfectly…

Nailed it. No notes.

The team released a statement and quotes, but it’s the usual new deal corporatespeak, about how proud the club is to strike this deal while completely ignoring the significance of what the team is doing here.

So that’s it, anything’s possible now. The rest of the league’s teams are going to fall in line pretty quickly now. Buckle up.
